'''1.7.10 Build 3''' is the third build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.7.10, released on August 7, 2014. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.7.10]].

== Additions ==
=== General ===
* Students can't do anything if they are frozen.
* Disabled Server Window save button when save is in progress.

== Removals ==
=== General ===
* "Supersecret Settings" button from the options menu

== Fixes ==
'''5 bugs fixed'''
* Custom world save folder not working.
* <code>@p</code>, <code>@r</code> and <code>@a</code> now work in command blocks with <code>/eduuser</code> commands like <code>togglefreeze</code> and <code>togglemute</code> of an individual student.
* Students not being able to check assignments.
* Chat not working.
* Some mods like Custom NPCs not working properly.
